climbs.name: Yo My First First Ascent, Gotta Name It Something Cool... Damn, I Got Nothing

content.description: Climbs the left side of a square arete.  Roof is the crux.  Also, it is a route requirement to take a photo while sitting, laying, etc. on "The Couch".
content.protection: TR, I don't have any beta on protection since I free soloed it.
content.location: Route is to the left of Psoriasis and is below a rock that I've deemed as "The Couch".  Photo shows it fairly well.

content.description: Climb a short arete to a ledge, then continue up a flared crack to the top.
content.protection: Easy TR set-up from trees above
content.location: To the left of the blunt arete

content.description: A few delicate balancy moves up a face through a slight overhang. Mantle over the lip to a large ledge and climb the roof using the crack system on the right - the hands are good, but it feels a little burly . Continue up a so so face section to your anchor.
content.protection: Easy TR set-up from trees above. Scant protection opportunities for trad.
content.location: Beneath the large ledge area (with roof). Left of Psoriasis. About 2 meters right of the blunt arete.

content.description: Getting off the ground can be tricky.
content.protection: Top rope from the trees on top.
content.location: Starts about 5' right of the crack.(Unknown Route.)  Face climbing to several small ledges and finish up on the crack to the right side of the roof.

content.description: Start on the greenish face, following thin face moves to a right-facing flake.  Use the flake and slippery feet to pull up to a ledge.  Continue up the large crack to the top out.
content.protection: Small to medium cams and small stoppers, or top rope.
content.location: Twenty feet to the left of Bird Merde (blocky chimney).

content.description: Start left of blocky chimney, right of psoriasis. Start just to left and below the slightly indented portion. Climb straight up and avoid bailing out to the chimney.
content.protection: 2 fixed anchors at the top for both blocky chimney and lateral horizon.
content.location: Just below the split tree growing out and up.

content.description: The center section is just below the ledge is the crux.
content.protection: Hand size gear or top rope.
content.location: Starts in the crack just right of Embarrass.  Keep to the left side of the roof at the top.

content.protection: Top rope from the trees above.
content.location: This is the left most route on the wall that climbs the center of the low angle face.

content.description: Climb the blocky chimney on the right side of the Right Sector.
content.location: Obvious broken chimney on the Right Sector.  Walk-off trail is 30 feet to the right.

content.description: Great mix of slab climbing and overhangs.  Top roping is the norm here but there are a handful of leadable climbs on this face.  The cliff stays well shaded on sunny days.  Due to the shade and the amount of easier climbs you will want to get here early.  It can fill up quick.  Share ropes here and try to set up the rope for multiple routes.  Don't miss the area classic Psoriasis (5.9).
